009package Ch08_Binary_Regions;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
014
015import java.awt.geom.Line2D;
016import java.util.List;
017
018import ij.IJ;
019import ij.ImagePlus;
020import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
021import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
022import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
023import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
024import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
025import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
028import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
030import imagingbook.common.regions.BinaryRegion;
031import imagingbook.common.regions.RegionContourSegmentation;
032import imagingbook.core.plugin.IjPluginName;
033import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
034
035/**
036 * <p>
037 * ImageJ plugin, shows each region's major axis as a vector scaled by the region's eccentricity. See Sec. 8.6 of [1]
038 * for additional details. Also demonstrates the use of the region property scheme, i.e., how to assign numeric
039 * properties to regions and retrieve them afterwards. Requires a binary image. Zero-value pixels are considered
040 * background, all other pixels are foreground. Display lookup tables (LUTs) are not considered. Results are drawn into
041 * a new image (pixel graphics), the original image is not modified. If no image is currently open, the plugin
042 * optionally loads a suitable sample image.
043 * </p>
044 * <p>
045 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
046 * (2022).
047 * </p>
048 *
049 * @author WB
050 * @version 2020/12/17
051 */
052@IjPluginName("Major Axis Demo")
053public class Major_Axis_Demo implements PlugInFilter {  // TODO: convert to overlay display
054        
055        /** Scale of the axis length. */
056        public static double DrawingScale = 50;
057        /** Color for drawing overlay graphics. */
058        public static BasicAwtColor DrawingColor = BasicAwtColor.Blue;
059        /** Stroke width for drawing overlay graphics. */
060        public static double StrokeWidth = 0.5;
061        
062        private ImagePlus im;
063        
064        /**
065         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
066         */
067        public Major_Axis_Demo() {
068                if (noCurrentImage()) {
069                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.ToolsSmall);
070                }
071        }
072        
073        @Override
074        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
075                this.im = im;
076                return DOES_8G;
077        }
078
079        @Override
080        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
081                if (!IjUtils.isBinary(ip)) {
082                        IJ.showMessage("Plugin requires a binary image!");
083                        return;
084                }
085
086                if (!runDialog())
087                        return;
088
089
090                // perform region segmentation:
091                RegionContourSegmentation segmenter = new RegionContourSegmentation((ByteProcessor) ip);
092                List<BinaryRegion> regions = segmenter.getRegions(true);
093
094                // calculate and register certain region properties:
095                for (BinaryRegion r : regions) {
096                        calculateRegionProperties(r);
097                }
098                
099                // draw major axis vectors (scaled by eccentricity) as vector overlays
100                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
101                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, DrawingColor.getColor()));
102                for (BinaryRegion r : regions) {
103                        if (r.getSize() > 10) {
104                                Pnt2d xc = r.getCenter();
105                                double x0 = xc.getX();
106                                double y0 = xc.getY();
107                                double x1 = x0 + DrawingScale * r.getProperty("dx");
108                                double y1 = y0 + DrawingScale * r.getProperty("dy");
109                                ola.addShape(xc.getShape(0.05 * DrawingScale));
110                                ola.addShape(new Line2D.Double(x0, y0, x1, y1));
111                        }
112                }
113                im.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
114        }
115        
116        private void calculateRegionProperties(BinaryRegion r) {
117                // calculate central moment mu11, mu20, mu02:
118                Pnt2d xctr = r.getCenter();
119                double xc = xctr.getX();
120                double yc = xctr.getY();
121                double mu11 = 0;
122                double mu20 = 0;
123                double mu02 = 0;
124                for (Pnt2d p : r) {
125                        double dx = (p.getX() - xc);
126                        double dy = (p.getY() - yc);
127                        mu11 = mu11 + dx * dy;
128                        mu20 = mu20 + dx * dx;
129                        mu02 = mu02 + dy * dy;
130                }
131                
132                double A = 2 * mu11;
133                double B = mu20 - mu02;
134                
135                double normAB = Math.sqrt(sqr(A) + sqr(B));
136                double scale = sqrt(2 * (sqr(A) + sqr(B) + B * sqrt(sqr(A) + sqr(B))));
137                
138                double dx = B + normAB;
139                double dy = A;
140                
141                r.setProperty("dx", dx / scale);
142                r.setProperty("dy", dy / scale);
143                
144                // calculate 2 versions of eccentricity:
145                double a = mu20 + mu02;
146                double b = Math.sqrt(Math.pow(mu20 - mu02, 2) + 4 * mu11 * mu11);
147                r.setProperty("ecc1", (a + b) / (a - b));
148                r.setProperty("ecc2", (Math.pow(mu20 - mu02,  2) + 4 * mu11 * mu11) / Math.pow(mu20 + mu02, 2));
149        }
150
151
152        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
153
154        private boolean runDialog() {
155                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(Region_Contours_Demo.class.getSimpleName());
156                gd.addEnumChoice("Drawing color", DrawingColor);
157                gd.addNumericField("Stroke width", StrokeWidth, 1);
158
159                gd.showDialog();
160                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
161                        return false;
162                }
163
164                DrawingColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
165                StrokeWidth = gd.getNextNumber();
166                return true;
167        }
168
169}
